SPONSORS

SKILLSHARE X CREATIVE PEP TALK
Our first ever online video course is out now on SKILLSHARE! 

Are you looking for your next big break? Whether you’ve NEVER had a big break in your creative career OR you’re a veteran creative who needs a new big break to reinvent yourself: this class is for you!!! Go to https://www.skillshare.com/r/profile/Andy-J.-Pizza/2832678 to get started!!!

 

WIREFRAME PODCAST FROM ADOBE
Wireframe is a podcast for designer’s and design curious creatives.

Whether you’re into UX, UI, technology... or just curious about the way design impacts our everyday lives, check out Adobe’s Wireframe Podcast NOW! https://link.chtbl.com/wireframe?sid=podcast.creativepeptalk

itunes:title: 287 - 3 Ways How to Kickstart Audience Growth When It's Plateaued
itunes:author: Jordan Aaron, Ryan Appleton, Andy J. Pizza, Yoni Wolf
itunes:summary:
Nothing is more frustrating than when you’re giving something all you’ve got and it doesn’t seem to be making any difference. You do this long enough and sooner or later you’re going to feel like there’s no point in showing up at all. 

If all of your old methods aren’t getting you anywhere new, maybe it’s time to try something different? In this episode we explore 3 new tactics to try when things have come to a standstill in your creative journey.
itunes:subtitle:
Nothing is more frustrating than when you’re giving something all you’ve got and it doesn’t seem to be making any difference. You do this long enough and sooner or later you’re going to feel like there’s no point in showing up at all. 

If all of your old methods aren’t getting you anywhere new, maybe it’s time to try something different? In this episode we explore 3 new tactics to try when things have come to a standstill in your creative journey.
